text: The Living Daylights is a 1987 British spy movie directed by John Glen and is the 15th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Joe Don Baker, Art Malik, Jeroen Krabb√©, John Rhys-Davies and Andreas Wisniewski. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists. The title song of the movie by the Norwegian pop music band A-ha was released with the same name.
